code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/luuduylinh/Desktop/PhoneStore/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var cartSlice=createSlice({name:'cart',initialState:{cart:[]},reducers:{addToCart:function addToCart(state,action){var itemInCart=state.cart.find(function(item){return item._id===action.payload._id;});if(itemInCart){itemInCart.quantity+=action.payload.quantity;}else{state.cart.push(_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},action.payload),{},{quantity:action.payload.quantity}));}},changeQuantityCart:function changeQuantityCart(state,action){var itemInCart=state.cart.find(function(item){return item._id===action.payload._id;});itemInCart.quantity=action.payload.quantity;},incrementQuantity:function incrementQuantity(state,action){var item=state.cart.find(function(item){return item._id===action.payload._id;});item.quantity++;},decrementQuantity:function decrementQuantity(state,action){var item=state.cart.find(function(item){return item._id===action.payload._id;});if(item.quantity===1){item.quantity=1;}else{item.quantity--;}},removeItem:function removeItem(state,action){var removeItem=state.cart.filter(function(item){return item._id!==action.payload._id;});state.cart=removeItem;},orderProduct:function orderProduct(state){state.cart=[];}}});var _cartSlice$actions=cartSlice.actions,addToCart=_cartSlice$actions.addToCart,changeQuantityCart=_cartSlice$actions.changeQuantityCart,incrementQuantity=_cartSlice$actions.incrementQuantity,decrementQuantity=_cartSlice$actions.decrementQuantity,removeItem=_cartSlice$actions.removeItem,orderProduct=_cartSlice$actions.orderProduct;export{addToCart,changeQuantityCart,incrementQuantity,decrementQuantity,removeItem,orderProduct};export default cartSlice.reducer;
